name: dyu-comments
description: standalone binaries for a real-time comment engine with support for anonymous or authenticated posts
author: dyu

scripts.build: rollup -c --environment production && cleancss -O2 removeDuplicateRules:on dist/build.css > dist/build.min.css && mv dist/build.min.css dist/build.css
scripts.start: http-server . & npm run dev & open http://127.0.0.1:8080
